description: Police say the driver of a Toyota Aygo, a 62-year-old man, died at the scene.
title: Man dies after five-vehicle M62 crash
title_page: Man dies after five-vehicle M62 crash - BBC News
maintext:
A man has died following a crash involving five vehicles on the M62.
Emergency crews were called to a serious collision on the eastbound carriageway between junctions 37 at Howden and 38 at North Cave at about 16:40 GMT on Wednesday.
A red DAF truck, white Toyota Yaris, grey Toyota Aygo, grey Peugeot and a red Kia Nira are believed to have to have been involved, Humberside Police said.
The driver of the Aygo, a 62-year-old man, died at the scene, a spokesperson said.
